name: Video Poker Double Up
description:
Video Poker Double Up slot machine is a free video poker game featuring a standard video poker slot machine with additional FIGHT feature ( One more chance to get another card at the end of a round ). Very interesting bonus, where you won't feel depressed when you lose a hand. You always get one more chance on every poker round.

Play for free now! The best casino slot poker machine with 12 new themes collection!

In any video poker slots machines, you can double up if you win any hand like Jacks or Better etc... Our double up is unique and entertaining. You are given five chances to double up on every winning. Whenever you win on betting for big or small, your price will double up. If you win continuously up to five times in a row, then a huge bonus waiting for you.

Get casino video poker double up now! You will feel relax and enjoy playing it.

Video Poker Double Up also features a lot of other bonuses like a Flush bonus: When you got flush 4 times. Similarly to straight bonus: When you got 4 times of straight then you are eligible for the jackpot as well. In addition, you can also collect a four of a kind bonus and a triple pair bonus. You can win each of their jackpots by winning three times of four of a kind or triple pair.

Unlimited bonuses with Casino Video Poker Double Up! Try it now!
